title: Horeca In Nood Logo
content:
Can someone help me on this one?  
What the Fonts gives me only close matches, but no cigar.

I need this to recreate their logo.

Thanks in advance,  
Thorens

comments.content:
My god, talk about right under our very noses. Kinda logic though, who still uses Haettenschweiler these days? It's easy to forget!

But thanks alot!
